data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fuente, María Carolina Silva-De La, Paredes-León, Ricardo, Casanueva, María Eugenia, Escobar-Huerta, Gustavo, Salas, Lucila Moreno (2015): A new genus and species of pterygosomatid mite (Acari: Pterygosomatidae) parasitizing Callopistes maculatus (Squamata: Teiidae) from Chile. Zootaxa 3972 (1): 65-74, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3972.1.4
